contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of December, 2001, the order of the Superior Court is hereby reversed. The matter is remanded to the trial court for resentencing consistent with Commonwealth v. Butler, 563 Pa. 324, 760 A.2d 384 (2000).
FLAHERTY, Chief Justice did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
SAYLOR, Justice files a dissenting statement.
